plot: Lambert House is a drop in center and shelter for GLBTQ youth in Seattle Washington. Through interviews with staff, volunteers and the youth themselves this film profiles the center and the work done there.
title: Weight of the World: A Story in Volunteering
plot_es: Lambert House is a drop in center and shelter for GLBTQ youth in Seattle Washington. Through interviews with staff, volunteers and the youth themselves this film profiles the center and the work done there.
original_name: Weight of the World: A Story in Volunteering
plot_en: Lambert House is a drop in center and shelter for GLBTQ youth in Seattle Washington. Through interviews with staff, volunteers and the youth themselves this film profiles the center and the work done there.
